item.description:
Looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come to a meetup with an international flair!
No formal presentations or homework! Just come join us for Kaffee und Kuchen and chat. Whether you are a native speaker, learned German in Germany or in college, high school or on your own, welcome! Let's have another lively meetup. Please come prepared to have a fun and interesting evening speaking with German speakers from all over the world! We meet on the first and third Thursdays of each month so November 1st and 15th.

We have many more people show up than the RSVP would indicate.
Dianne
Note: If you Mapquest Panera, it might send you to the wrong place! It is at Bishop's Corner Shopping Center, next to Staples, intersection of Routes 44 & 218.
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch November Meetup
